location.name: Bayanaul Village
location.content: This is Bayanaul Village with population of about 9000 wonderful people.

location.name: Lake Zhassybye
location.content: Zhasybai is the most beautiful lake of Bayanaul National Park.

location.name: Konyr-Aulie
location.content: A cave in Mount Akkaragai on the territory of the Bayanaul National Park, 17 km northeast of the village of Bayanaul.

location.name: Toraigyr
location.content: At Lake Toraigyr rises the Peak of the Brave. the rock bears this name recently - from the 1950s, when the mass development of tourism in the Bayanaul mountains began.

location.name: Kempirtas Rock
location.content: Another miracle of nature is the rock Kempirtas or Baba Yaga. On the one hand you will see an old woman, and on the other the appearance of a young girl.
